column5: Well we started again the LHFC 1st School Salmon Hatchery Release happened today, 16 more to go, there should be 1 or 2 school's each day for the next week or so. Thanx to Al, Steve & Wayne for running the Tours & helping with the release.Tight Lines SBK   http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2014/04/teeswater-sacred-heart-school-salmon.html
